# devkit-plugin

> Claude Code Plugin for automated dev workflows

Automatisiert Code-Standards, Git-Conventions und Dokumentation via Claude Code Hooks. Single Source of Truth in config.jsonc.

<!-- AUTO:START - Generated by devkit-plugin. DO NOT EDIT. -->
## Tech Stack

- **Type**: plugin
- **Package Manager**: npm

## Quick Start

```bash
npm install
npm run dev
npm run build
```

## Architecture

| Layer | Tier | Description |
|-------|------|-------------|
| `core` | 0 | Types, errors, constants - nur stdlib |
| `lib` | 1 | I/O-Adapter: config, git, tools, sync |
| `arch` | 2 | Architecture-Analyse und Visualisierung |
| `events` | 3 | Claude Code Hook-Handler |

## Commands

All devkit commands via `/dk`:

| Command | Description |
|---------|-------------|
| `/dk dev feat <desc>` | New feature |
| `/dk dev fix <desc>` | Bug fix |
| `/dk git pr` | Create PR |
| `/dk git pr merge` | Merge PR |
